name: Black Crocheted D Rings Necklace (Free UK P&P)
description: This unusual statement neckpiece is made from brass D rings that have been crocheted around and stitched together. The necklace fastens with long black satin ribbons that allow you to wear it at any length to flatter any outfit- (it looks great with a contrasting colour underneath.) This particular neckpiece was inspired by 1880-1916 Art Nouveau designs. This fashionable and trendy bib neckpiece is so unusual that it will make you the envy of all your friends! The necklace is presented on white card and wrapped in white tissue paper- making a great gift for a fashionista!

name: Black Flower Necklace (Free UK P&P)
description: This stylish, statement necklace / neckpiece has been crocheted using black cotton. The centre features good quality faux pearls and it fastens with long black satin ribbons- allowing you to wear it at any length to flatter any outfit. The flower resembles a camellia and the pearls add that sophisticated edge. This piece was inspired by 1960's embellished black and white designs. The flower looks great worn high- with the ribbons hidden under a collar, or really low so it swings. Whatever way you wear it- you will be the envy of all your friends. The necklace is presented on white card and wrapped in white tissue paper- making a great gift for a fashionista!

name: Black Crocheted Rings Neckpiece (Free UK P&P)
description: This unusual statement necklace/neckpiece has been made from metal rings that have been crocheted around and stitched together. It fastens with long black satin ribbons that allow you to tie it at any length to flatter any outfit. This neckpiece can be worn high around the neck or around the edge of a T-shirt/ sweater to look as though it is part of the garment. (it looks great with a contrasting colour underneath.) This particular neckpiece was inspired by 1880-1916 Art Nouveau designs. This fashionable and trendy bib neckpiece is so unusual that it will make you the envy of all your friends! The necklace is presented on white card and wrapped in white tissue paper- making a great gift for a fashionista!

name: Flower Bib Necklace (Free UK P&P)
description: This handmade bib neckpiece/ necklace is a statement piece. It is made from crocheted flowers that have been embellished with clear glass beads. The neckpiece fastens with long black satin ribbons that allows you to wear it at any length to flatter any outfit. This neckpiece/ bib can be worn high around the neck to fill in a V-neck or around the edge of a T-shirt/ sweater to look as though it is part of the garment. (it looks great with a contrasting colour underneath.) This particular piece was inspired by 1960's embellished designs. This fashionable and trendy bib neckpiece is so unusual that it will make you the envy of all your friends! The necklace is presented on white card and wrapped in white tissue paper- making a great gift for a fashionista!

name: Bow Tie Necklace (Free UK P&P)
description: This unusual statement neckpiece has been crocheted using black cotton yarn. This innovative neckpiece fastens with long black satin ribbons that allow you to wear it at any length to flatter any outfit. This particular design was inspired by the recent catwalks and the classic fashion in the old black and white films. Wear this bow tie high up under the collar or lower for a more quirky effect. This fashionable and trendy necklace is very unusual that will make you the envy of all your friends! The necklace is presented on white card and wrapped in white tissue paper- making a great gift for a fashionista!
